page.title: 19GREENS GARAGE, AISTHORPE
page.content: The garage has been in the Greens family for 15 years. Mr. George Green, the owner, has three children. One daughter and his son help at the garage. His son, David, is a keen sportsman. He has won many events in dressage and cross country on his horse Fred. He also enjoys water skiing and has his own speedboat. The garage is a great asset to the village it serves petrol and also gives the vehicles resprays and servicing and performs M.O.T. tests. The garage opens every day at 8 o'clock and closes at 6 o'clock on a week day. Although the family live close to the garage it has been broken into and items have been stolen. Mr. Green has recently had a heart operation from which he is recovering well. Mrs. Green helps her husband and is also caretaker at Scampton Village School.
